title: NNVCD Contextual Retrieval Configuration
description: Configuration for retrieving historical conflict patterns from ACLED dataset based on LGA/State

processing_logic.step_1: Identify the State and LGA from the incoming report
processing_logic.step_2: Query historical ACLED data for events in the specified location
processing_logic.step_3: Analyze frequency and type of past events to establish baseline patterns
processing_logic.step_4: Compare current report against historical patterns for trend analysis
processing_logic.fallback: If LGA is unspecified, retrieve state-level data and note reduced precision
